title: Miley Cyrus - Angels Like You (Official Video)
author: MileyCyrusVEVO
description:
Miley’s New Album Plastic Hearts is Available Now: https://mileyl.ink/PlasticHearts
 
View merch at Miley’s official store now! https://smarturl.it/MileyStore?iQid=yt  

Follow Miley on Spotify, Apple Music or Deezer to get new music as soon as it’s out: https://smarturl.it/FollowMC?iQid=yt 

Connect with Miley
Facebook: https://mileyl.ink/facebook 
Twitter: https://mileyl.ink/twitter 
Instagram: https://mileyl.ink/instagram 
Snapchat: https://mileyl.ink/snapchat 
Tiktok: https://mileyl.ink/tiktok 
Site: http://www.mileycyrus.com

LYRICS
Flowers in hand, waiting for me 
Every word in poetry 
Won’t call me by name, only baby 
The more that you give the less that I 
Need everyone says I look happy 
When it feels right

I know that you’re wrong for me
Gonna wish we never met on the day I leave
I brought you down to your knees 
‘Cause they say that misery loves company 
It's not your fault I ruin everything
And it’s not you’re fault I can’t be what you need
Baby 
Angels like you can’t fly down here with me 
I’m everything they said I would be

(La La la)
I’m everything they said I would be

I’ll put you down slow
Love you goodbye 
before you let go, just one more time
Take off you’re clothes
pretend that it’s fine
A little more hurt won’t kill you 
tonight mama says you don’t look happy 
Close your eyes 

I know that you’re wrong for me
Gonna wish we never met on the day I leave
I brought you down to your knees 
‘Cause they say that misery loves company 
It's not your fault I ruin everything
And it’s not you’re fault I can’t be what you need
Baby 
Angels like you can’t fly down here with me 
I’m everything they said I would be

I know that you’re wrong for me
Gonna wish we never met on the day I leave
I brought you down to your knees 
‘Cause they say that misery loves company 
It's not your fault I ruin everything
And it’s not you’re fault I can’t be what you need
Baby 
Angels like you can’t fly down here with me 
I’m everything they said I would be

CREDITS:
Directed By Alana O’Herlihy & Miley Cyrus
DOP: Kevin Hayden
Editor: Alana O’Herlihy
Graphics and Logos by: Emmanuel O’Brien & Eamonn Freel
On-set Production: Eva Evans; Camera Operator: Yuya Kudo;
Post Production: Louise Mérat at Streeters

#MileyCyrus #AngelsLikeYou #PlasticHearts #Pop

localize.description:
麦莉新专辑《塑料心》现已上市：https://mileyl.ink/PlasticHearts。
 
现在就到Miley的官方商店查看商品！https://smarturl.it/MileyStore?iQid=yt。 

在Spotify、Apple Music或Deezer上关注Miley，一旦有新的音乐出来，就能立即获得：https://smarturl.it/FollowMC?iQid=yt。

与Miley联系
Facebook: https://mileyl.ink/facebook 
Twitter: https://mileyl.ink/twitter 
Instagram: https://mileyl.ink/instagram 
Snapchat: https://mileyl.ink/snapchat 
Tiktok：https://mileyl.ink/tiktok 
网站：http://www.mileycyrus.com

抒情诗
手捧鲜花，等着我 
诗词中的每一个字 
不叫我的名字，只叫宝宝 
你给的越多，我给的越少 
需要大家都说我看起来很幸福 
当它感觉正确的时候

我知道你不适合我
会希望我离开那天我们从未见过面
我让你跪下来 
"因为他们说苦难喜欢陪伴 
这不是你的错，我毁了一切
这不是你的错 我不能成为你需要的人
婴幼儿 
像你这样的天使不能和我一起飞到这里来。
我是他们说的一切，我将是

(拉拉)
我是他们说的一切，我将是

我慢慢放你下来
爱你，再见 
临走前，再给你一次机会
脱掉你的衣服
装作没事
多受点伤也不会死 
今晚妈妈说你看起来不开心 
闭上你的眼睛 

我知道你不适合我
会希望我离开那天我们从未见过面
我让你跪下来 
"因为他们说苦难喜欢陪伴 
这不是你的错，我毁了一切
这不是你的错 我不能成为你需要的人
婴幼儿 
像你这样的天使不能和我一起飞到这里来。
我是他们说的一切，我将是

我知道你不适合我
会希望我离开那天我们从未见过面
我让你跪下来 
"因为他们说苦难喜欢陪伴 
这不是你的错，我毁了一切
这不是你的错 我不能成为你需要的人
婴幼儿 
像你这样的天使不能和我一起飞到这里来。
我是他们说的一切，我将是

片名：
导演： 阿拉娜-奥赫利希和麦莉-赛勒斯
DOP：Kevin Hayden
编辑：Alana O Herlihy Alana O'Herlihy
图形和标识由......Emmanuel O'Brien和Eamonn Freel设计。Emmanuel O'Brien & Eamonn Freel.
现场制作。Eva Evans；摄像师： 工藤悠哉：
